Headline: #6 Jackson Park Express Temporary Reroute at 47th/Lake Park
ShortDescription: 6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Stony Island, 57th and Lake Shore Drive due to street blockage near 47th/Lake Park.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Stony Island, 57th and Lake Shore Drive due to street blockage near 47th/Lake Park.

Allow extra travel time.
